thread.title: Sir Patrick Stewart Reads Negative One Star Reviews of Iconic Monuments From Around the World
thread.title_full: Sir Patrick Stewart Reads Negative One Star Reviews of Iconic Monuments From Around the World

author: Glen Tickle
title: Sir Patrick Stewart Reads Negative One Star Reviews of Iconic Monuments From Around the World
text:
GQ asked Sir Patrick Stewart to read negative one star reviews of iconic monuments from around the world like the Eiffel Tower , Mt. Rushmore , and Stonehenge .
Shakespearean-trained actor Patrick Stewart puts his chops to the test reading negative reviews of famous world monuments.
